description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod="$pod", app="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod="$pod", app="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])

title: Spring Boot
